LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_HeavyMachineGun.label: Heavy machine gun bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Autocannon.label: Mech Autocannon
LanguageData.DMS_Autocannon.description:
an autocannon mech soldier and infantry support platform.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroid can operate.
LanguageData.DMS_Autocannon.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Autocannon.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_DGL.label: heavy grenade round
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_Dragoon_Rifle.label: armor piercing shell
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_RR.label: recoilless grenade round
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.label: 2A38M
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.description:
A dual-barrel heavy autocannon for infantry suppression / anti air platform.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, and its too heavy so only specific automatroids can operate this weapon system.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: 2A38M
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.label: MPQFS-85M "Dawnblade"
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.description:
A multi-role quick-firing gun modified mech use, only capable of being mounted on super-heavy units like the Tarbosaurus. Its terrifying rate of fire and power have proven to be effective at destroying exostriders in past mechanoid wars.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, and only made for these specific units who could wield them with effectiveness exclusively.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DawnbladeM.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonGrenade.label: Mech Heavy Grenade Launcher
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonGrenade.description:
A hand held gun-mortar designed for mech operation. A six round revolver action allows for quick successive shots.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, and only made for these specific units who could wield them with effectiveness exclusively.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonGrenade.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.label: Mech Anti-tank Gun
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.description:
A lightweight mass produced anti-tank gun for heavy mechs and dragoon armor.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, and only made for these specific units who could wield them with effectiveness exclusively.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.label: Recoilless Cannon
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.description:
A recoilless cannon designed to snipe the heavily-armed target over distant ranges.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, and its heavy weight makes this exclusive for mech usage only.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.label: Mech HMG
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.description:
A heavy machine gun for a mech soldier or as an infantry support platform.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, the heavy weight of this weapon system excludes it from human usage.
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.label: Sniper Cannon
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.description:
An ultra heavy rifle loaded with autocannon caliber rounds, it has proven the capability to snipe an exostrider over the distance, and is specially designed for long-range anti-mech sniping operations.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, and only made for these specific units who could wield them with effectiveness exclusively.
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Sniper Cannon
